getAvailableActions

public int[] getAvailableActions(long id,
                                 java.util.Map inputs)
                          throws WorkflowException,
                                 java.rmi.RemoteException
Get the available actions for the specified workflow instance.

Parameters:
id - The workflow instance id.
inputs - The inputs map to pass on to conditions
Returns:
An array of action id's that can be performed on the specified entry
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified id does not exist, or if its workflow descriptor is no longer available or has become invalid.
WorkflowException
java.rmi.RemoteException

Get a list of workflow names available

Returns:
String[] an array of workflow names.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying workflow factory cannot obtain a list of workflow names.
